phone_call.description: A voice communication between two parties.

specific_fields.phone_number_sender: The phone number of the person initiating the call
specific_fields.phone_number_receiver: The phone number of the person receiving the call
specific_fields.duration: Length of the call in seconds or minutes
specific_fields.topic: The main subject or topic of discussion during the call

bank_transaction.description: Transfer of funds between accounts or entities.

specific_fields.currency: The currency of the transaction (e.g., USD, DZD, EUR)
specific_fields.bank_name: The name of the bank handling the transaction
specific_fields.transaction_method: The method used for the transaction (e.g., mobile app, wire transfer, ATM)

travel_movement.description: Physical movement of a person from one city/place to another.

specific_fields.transport_mode: The type of transportation used (e.g., train, flight, car, bus)
specific_fields.ticket_number: The reference number or identifier for the travel ticket
specific_fields.purpose: The reason for the travel (e.g., visit family, business meeting, tourism)

meeting.description: A gathering of people for discussion.

specific_fields.agenda: The topics or items to be discussed in the meeting
specific_fields.outcome: The results or decisions made during the meeting

digital_communication.description: Any exchange of messages via email, SMS, instant messaging (WhatsApp, Signal, Telegram), or social media DMs.

specific_fields.sender_identifier: The email address, phone number, or username of the sender
specific_fields.receiver_identifier: The email address, phone number, or username of the receiver
specific_fields.platform: The specific app or service used (e.g., Signal, Gmail, WhatsApp)
specific_fields.content_summary: A brief summary of what was discussed or attached
specific_fields.encryption_status: Whether the message was encrypted or plain text (e.g., 'End-to-End', 'None')

physical_surveillance.description: An observed movement, sighting, or action of a subject recorded by law enforcement officers or surveillance cameras.

specific_fields.officer_or_source_id: The ID of the officer or the camera ID reporting the sighting
specific_fields.observed_action: What the subject was doing (e.g., entering a building, handing over a package)
specific_fields.vehicle_details: Make, model, and license plate of any vehicle involved
specific_fields.clothing_description: Description of what the subject was wearing

illicit_exchange.description: A physical transfer of illegal goods (drugs, weapons, cash, hardware, stolen items) between two or more parties.

specific_fields.item_description: Details of the item being exchanged (e.g., 'Blue bag', 'Hard drives')
specific_fields.quantity_or_weight: The amount of the item (e.g., '2kg', '50 units')
specific_fields.estimated_value: The monetary value of the goods if mentioned
specific_fields.concealment_method: How the item was hidden (e.g., 'Inside a spare tire', 'Under a jacket')

border_crossing.description: Movement of a person across national borders via Air, Land, or Sea ports.

specific_fields.border_post_name: The specific entry/exit point (e.g., 'Algiers Airport', 'Oum Teboul')
specific_fields.passport_number: The passport ID used for the crossing
specific_fields.travel_direction: Whether the subject was Entering or Exiting the country
specific_fields.luggage_inspection_result: What was found during customs inspection (e.g., 'Clean', 'Undeclared Cash')

cyber_incident.description: Unauthorized access, malware deployment, or suspicious network activity on a computer system.

specific_fields.target_system_ip: The IP address or server name being attacked
specific_fields.data_impacted: What data was stolen, encrypted, or accessed
specific_fields.timestamp_utc: The time of the attack in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)
